miic.core.stream.stream_add_lat_lon_ele¶

stream_add_lat_lon_ele(st, df)[source]¶

Add lat lon ele information to each trace if of a stream, if available.

This function checks all the traces in the stream st and if their name is available in the DataFrame structure df, the corresponding lat, lon and ele are included in the tr.stats dictionary.

Parameters:
  • st (Stream) – The Stream to which add geo informations.
  • df (DataFrame) – The dataframe that has as index the stations name and 3 columns lat, lon and ele.
Return type:

Stream
Returns:

st_with_geo: Stream with trace’ geo information updated.
